page.title: 03COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: (BRITISH TELECOM) About 90% of the houses have telephones,many with internal extension(s) to bedrooms etc.There are no telephone exchanges in the area; Kirkham exchange serves Newton,Clifton, and Freckleton;Preston serves Lea Town and Salwick.The code is 0772 for both exchanges.All businesses in the area are well equipped with telephones,and there is an excellent repair service from Preston. (POSTAL SERVICE) All letters and parcels come from the sorting office at Preston.Letters are delivered and collected twice daily 2 Sub post-offices( Newton and Clifton) and 8 post boxes are in the area. (LOCAL ADVERTISING) Adverts in local shop windows,by hand on a door to door basis,or in local newspapers.None printed in the block.
